title: The Metropolitan Museum of Art
description: The Met is a treasure trove of art and history, housing an extensive collection of artifacts from around the world. From ancient Egyptian mummies to Renaissance masterpieces, it's a journey through time and culture that art lovers will cherish.

services.title: The Met Audio Guides
services.intro: Take advantage of audio guides at The Met for a self- guided tour, allowing you to delve into the rich history of the museum's collections.

services.title: Museum Gift Shop Personal Shoppers
services.intro: Receive personalized shopping assistance in The Met's gift shop, helping you find unique art-inspired items.

services.title: The Met Art History Lectures
services.intro: Attend informative lectures on art history topics, providing a deeper understanding of the museum's collections.

services.title: The Met Museum Store
services.intro: Explore a vast selection of art books, exhibition catalogs, and merchandise related to The Met.

packages.title: The Met Art Lover's Weekend
packages.text: Immerse yourself in art history with a 2-day stay, guided tours, and special access to The Met's collections.

packages.title: VIP Met Experience
packages.text: Enhance your visit with a 1-day VIP package, offering exclusive curator-led tours, behind-the-scenes access, and a private art history lecture.

packages.title: The Met Family Discovery Package
packages.text: Bring the family for a 2-day visit, featuring interactive tours, art history lectures for kids, and accommodations near the museum.

packages.title: Art and Dining at The Met
packages.text: Combine your love for art and food with a 2-day package including The Met admission and dining at artistic-themed restaurants in the city.

packages.title: The Met Art Workshop Retreat
packages.text: Immerse yourself in art creation with a 4-day retreat, including hands-on art workshops, access to The Met's resources, and a showcase of your work.

packages.title: The Met Cultural Exploration
packages.text: Dive into the rich cultural tapestry of The Met with a 3-day package including art history lectures, guided tours, and visits to cultural neighborhoods.
